rewards.name: Digital Badges ("Case Prep Pro," etc.)
rewards.description: Earn a digital, shareable badge for your LinkedIn or email signature to certify your prep milestones.

rewards.name: ATS Optimization Guide
rewards.description: A comprehensive guide on how to format your resume to get past automated screeners and into human hands.

rewards.name: E-books / Guides
rewards.description: Instantly download a guide like "Top 50 Consulting Interview Questions" or "Finance Excel Shortcuts."

rewards.name: Finance & Consulting Cheat Sheets
rewards.description: Quick-reference guides covering key concepts like DCF, valuation, and strategy frameworks.

rewards.name: LinkedIn Headline & About Me Template Pack
rewards.description: Optimize your LinkedIn profile with pre-built examples tailored to land roles in tech, finance, and consulting.

rewards.name: Resume Template Bundle
rewards.description: A pack of consulting, finance, and tech-ready resume templates to make your application stand out.

rewards.name: Azure E-Learning
rewards.description: A curated playlist of the best free labs, GitHub repos, and tutorials to prepare for cloud certifications.

rewards.name: Cover Letter & Email Outreach Templates
rewards.description: A collection of proven templates for cold emails, networking requests, and formal cover letters.

rewards.name: Professional Headshot Editing / LinkedIn Banner Templates
rewards.description: Use AI tools and premium templates to create a professional LinkedIn banner and polish your headshot.

rewards.name: Networking Event Invites
rewards.description: Receive an invitation to an exclusive virtual meetup with peers and professionals in your target industry.

rewards.name: Free or Discounted Coursera / edX / Udemy Courses
rewards.description: Get a voucher for a free or heavily discounted online course to earn a new certificate or skill.

rewards.name: Azure Exam Vouchers
rewards.description: Receive a free exam voucher code to sit for your official Microsoft Azure certification exam.

rewards.name: Peer Accountability Groups
rewards.description: Get placed into a curated "prep pod" with motivated peers who are targeting the same roles as you.

rewards.name: Case Interview Prep Pack
rewards.description: A complete digital toolkit with practice cases, frameworks, and example solutions for consulting interviews.

rewards.name: Technical Prep Packs
rewards.description: Sharpen your technical skills with prep materials for SQL, Python, Excel, and financial modeling.

rewards.name: Coffee Chats with Professionals (Group-based)
rewards.description: An informal, small-group networking chat with an industry professional to ask questions and build connections.

rewards.name: "Ask Me Anything" with Alumni
rewards.description: Join an exclusive group Q&A session with recently placed alumni to learn about their recruiting journey.

rewards.name: Resume Review
rewards.description: Get your resume personally reviewed by an industry expert who will provide actionable, written feedback.

rewards.name: Exclusive Masterclasses / Workshops
rewards.description: Gain access to a live or recorded expert-led workshop on topics like "Breaking into MBB" or "IB Analyst Life."

rewards.name: Recruiter List Access
rewards.description: Unlock a curated, private list of recruiter contacts at top firms to accelerate your job outreach.

rewards.name: Mock Interviews
rewards.description: Practice a full case, behavioral, or technical interview with a trained student leader or alumnus and get direct feedback.

rewards.name: 1-on-1 Career Coaching Session
rewards.description: A personalized 30-minute session with a volunteer industry champion to get tailored career advice.
